concept.title: Operation Modes and Unit State

othermeta.name: shortdesc
othermeta.content: Describes the system operation modes and unit state indications, including state changes and protective positions.

othermeta.name: entities
othermeta.content: ups system; inverter; bypass switch; battery; breaker; control panel

othermeta.name: tags
othermeta.content: operation modes, unit state, inverter protection, breaker positions, state monitoring, ups control

othermeta.name: usecase
othermeta.content: explain system operation modes and unit state behaviour for operation and maintenance

conbody.p: The systems operation mode depends on different settings and status of the system. The system will automatically detect the appropriate operation mode and automatically switch to it, depending on its configuration. It is also possible to manually switch to most operation modes.
The unit state is shown in the bottom left corner of the display. It is not necessary the same as the operation mode.
The images shows a sample of how the mimic can look for the operation mode or unit state. It is possible for some breakers to have another position than shown.
